issue.title: [Ruby] Support Decimal256 type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10604](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10604). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The C++ implementation now support it.  We need to ensure Ruby/Gobject bindings do as well.

comments.body:
